data.name: Little Inner Monsters - Artbook + Printable Cards + Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Also recommended for you



https://store.steampowered.com/app/1813190/Little_Inner_Monsters__Card_Game/?utm_source=steampage&utm_campaign=artb_page


About the Game

Get familiar with the Little Inner Monsters. They are the feelings we deal with on a daily basis, portrayed as cute monsters.
They will be present in Little Inner Monsters - the Card Game - and are also in Unlock the Feelings.

This is extra content to those games, where you get:
- Artbook including the inspiration for creating the monsters, initial drafts of the art from artist Katia Numakura. In PDF format.
- Printable versions of the Cards for you to play a physical simplified version of the card game. In PDF format.
- The soundtrack with six arrangements, fit for different moods. In MP3 format.

Purchasing this will greatly support our studio to keep creating more games!
Thanks in advance!


To get the PDF file, after downloading the content, go to the soundtrack page on the Steam Library and click the "Browse Local Files" button.

data.short_description: Artbook, Printable Cards, and Soundtrack for Little Inner Monsters - Card Game / Unlock the Feelings. Support the developers and get to know the Little Inner Monsters better.
